messages.messageBody:
>I love Shakespeare, and when we watch one of the plays on video with our
10yo
>son I go to this site and print out the story - it's really easy for him to
>understand, and the illustrations are awesome!
>
> <A HREF="http://www.promo.net/pg/query.cgi">PROJECT GUTENBERG - Charles
and
>Mary Lamb
></A>
>
>Hope this helps :)>>>
>
>Linda in FL :), I went to the site, and if I understand it correctly I
have to be able to download it then I can print? I have to wait until I get
my new computer, as I am skimming by with a JAM PACKED hard drive, by
reading and deleting mail as it comes in, if I let it go for a day or two,
It gets so overfull that the printer wont print and many other problems, so
I have written the site down and I thank you tons for sending it, I think it
will be a great asset for us, and I hope I acctually get to use it soon!!!!!
Tanya Ohio
>
>
>

messages.subject: Re: plays for home
messages.msgSnippet: I love Shakespeare, and when we watch one of the plays on video with our 10yo son I go to this site and print out the story - it s really easy for him to
messages.messageBody:
I love Shakespeare, and when we watch one of the plays on video with our 10yo
son I go to this site and print out the story - it's really easy for him to
understand, and the illustrations are awesome!

<A HREF="http://www.promo.net/pg/query.cgi">PROJECT GUTENBERG - Charles and
Mary Lamb
</A>

Hope this helps :)

Linda in FL :)


In a message dated 7/7/99 5:16:30 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
michigan@... writes:

<< Brooke in BC, we just watched the twelth night on video, and my 12 and 10
year old loved it!!! they asked to watch it again, boy was I surprised,
tonight we are watching Othello, I know nothing about this one, but I guess
I will learn with them!
Tanya Ohio >>

messages.subject: plays for home
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, We acted out A Midsummer Nights Dream last year  at home and the girls loved it. Are there Shakespearean or other plays which others have
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

We acted out "A Midsummer Nights Dream" last year at home and the girls
loved it. Are there Shakespearean or other plays which others have
read/performed at home which were fun and satisfying? The girls are 8 & 10
years of age.

Brooke in BC
brynlee@...
